title: Destiny Found
description: With more questions than I have answers to, I have to complete the bonds with my mates and find a way to protect my people. Time is running out before the truth of who I am will spread throughout my kingdom. Once he finds out, I know Silas will be coming after me. Deep down I know it‘ll come down to a final battle. I’ll risk everything to save my people, I just don’t know if all of us will come out on the other side alive. This is the third and final book in the Precarious Shifters series.
author: Leah Steele
